name: SPEC_CANCER_SCREENING_PAT
description: This table stores documentation about the cancer screening status of patients.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CANCER_SCREENING_PATIENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for whether patient is a cancer screening patient.
